code: import React,{useState}from'react';import axios from'axios';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const ChangeProfilePic=()=>{const[profilePic,setProfilePic]=useState(null);const handleFileChange=e=>{setProfilePic(e.target.files[0]);};const handleUpload=async e=>{e.preventDefault();const formData=new FormData();formData.append('profilePic',profilePic);try{const response=await axios.post('/api/auth/change-profile-pic',formData,{headers:{'Content-Type':'multipart/form-data'}});alert(response.data.message);}catch(error){console.error('Error uploading profile picture:',error);}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{onSubmit:handleUpload,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{children:"Change Profile Picture"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"file",onChange:handleFileChange})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"submit",children:"Upload"})]});};export default ChangeProfilePic;
